original: Kark, Kristian Henning, direktör, Norrköping, f. 3/10/80 i Kvillinge, Östergötl. 1. Barn: Stig f. 11, leg. läk., Åke 13’, aukt. rev. — Genomig. Len-nings vävsk. 98-99’, fackskolor i Tyskl. 99-00. Varit tekn. ledare f. Gamla-bro A-B o. Fors Ull-spinneri A-B, verkst. dir. f. A-B Törnell & Ringström i Norrköp. sed. 29. Led. av styr. f. .sistn. företag samt Norrköp :-kretsen av Sv:es textilind :förb. o. Lennings textiltekn. inst.
translated: Kark, Kristian Henning, director, Norrköping, b. 3/10/80 in Kvillinge, Östergötland. 1st child: Stig b. 11, licensed physician. Åke b. 13, authorized accountant. Graduated from Lenning's weaving school 98-99, specialized schools in Germany 99-00. Has been technical manager for Gamla-bro AB and Fors Ull-spinneri AB, managing director for AB Törnell & Ringström in Norrköping since 1929. Member of the board of the last mentioned company as well as the Norrköping district of the Swedish Textile Industry Association and Lenning's Textile Technical Institute.
